name: TECHX Asia 2017
content: As Asia’s leading event on commercial applications of emerging technologies, TECHX will bring together leading minds, entrepreneurs and innovators across the entire spectrum of emerging technologies: IoT, drones, AI, 3D, robotics, data, cyber security, blockchain, GPS. Driven by generating genuine business connections, TECHX is committed to showcasing your products, ideas and innovations and ensuring they are shared with the right customers in a new and exciting way. This is a large conference agenda spanning eight vertical industries and eight emerging technologies, so whether you’re an industry technologist or a technology specialist, we’ve got something for you.
